mapper.insert: insert into st.tna values(st.tna_seq.nextval, #{tna_id}, (SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL), null, #{tna_start_status_code}, null)
mapper.update: update st.TnA set tna_end_time = (SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL), tna_end_status_code = #{tna_end_status_code} where tna_seq = #{tna_seq}
mapper.select: select tna_seq from st.tna where (tna_id = #{sessionId}) and (to_char((SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL),'yyyymmdd') like to_char(tna_start_time,'yyyymmdd'))
select tna_start_time from st.tna where (tna_id = #{sessionId}) and (to_char((SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL),'yyyymmdd') like to_char(tna_start_time,'yyyymmdd'))
select tna_end_time from st.tna where (tna_id = #{sessionId}) and (to_char((SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL),'yyyymmdd') like to_char(tna_end_time,'yyyymmdd'))

select t.tna_seq, t.tna_id, t.tna_start_time, t.tna_end_time, t.tna_start_status_code, t.tna_end_status_code, s1.tna_status_name"TNA_START_STATUS_NAME", s2.tna_status_name"TNA_END_STATUS_NAME" from st.tna t left join st.tna_status s1 on (t.TNA_START_STATUS_CODE = s1.tna_status_code) left join st.tna_status s2 on (t.TNA_END_STATUS_CODE = s2.tna_status_code) where (t.tna_id = #{sessionId}) order by t.tna_seq

select t.tna_seq, t.tna_id, t.tna_start_time, t.tna_end_time, t.tna_start_status_code, t.tna_end_status_code, s1.tna_status_name"TNA_START_STATUS_NAME", s2.tna_status_name"TNA_END_STATUS_NAME" from st.tna t left join st.tna_status s1 on (t.TNA_START_STATUS_CODE = s1.tna_status_code) left join st.tna_status s2 on (t.TNA_END_STATUS_CODE = s2.tna_status_code) where (t.tna_id = #{sessionId}) and (t.tna_seq = #{tna_seq}) order by t.tna_seq
mapper.insert: insert into st.tna_objection values(st.tna_obj_seq.nextval, #{tna_obj_reason}, #{tna_obj_id}, (SELECT CURRENT_DATE FROM DUAL), #{tna_obj_changed_code}, #{tna_seq}, #{tna_obj_status}, #{tna_obj_proc_status_code})
mapper.select: select to_char(tna_start_time, 'mm')"DATE",tna_start_status_code,count(*)"COUNTING" from st.tna where (tna_id = #{sessionId}) and (to_char(tna_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') like (#{selectYearValue}||'%')) group by to_char(tna_start_time, 'mm'),tna_start_status_code
select tna_start_status_code,count(*)"COUNTING" from st.tna where (tna_id = #{sessionId}) and (to_char(tna_start_time, 'yyyy-mm') like (#{selectYearValue}||'%')) group by tna_start_status_code

select to_char(tna_end_time, 'mm')"DATE",tna_end_status_code,count(*)"COUNTING" from st.tna where (tna_id = #{sessionId}) and (to_char(tna_end_time, 'yyyy-mm') like (#{selectYearValue}||'%')) group by to_char(tna_end_time, 'mm'),tna_end_status_code
select tna_end_status_code,count(*)"COUNTING" from st.tna where (tna_id = #{sessionId}) and (to_char(tna_end_time, 'yyyy-mm') like (#{selectYearValue}||'%')) group by tna_end_status_code
select to_char(tna_start_time, 'yyyy')"DATE" from st.tna where (tna_id = #{sessionId}) group by to_char(tna_start_time, 'yyyy') order by 1
